name: AI Island Resorts
description: React.js hotel reservation application as BYOFE model utilizes Contentful, API and Netlify deployed.
modalDesc: This code-a-long project explores the features of React Hooks in order to create a 'build your own front end' framework and CSS for uniform design.

name: Burger Mobile First
description: This application uses React Hooks, Redux to manage burger orders, secure and validate customer data from a mobile device to Firebase endpoint.
modalDesc: TThis application uses React Hooks, Redux to manage burger orders, secure and validate customer data from a mobile device to Firebase endpoint..

name: Friend Finder
description: This simple friends API builder takes in survey form data, then compares the user's data against the current friends API list to find the best 'friend' match.
modalDesc: NodeJS and Express server-side JavaScript code utilized to create a form and compare data to find a 'best-friend' match up.

name: Memory Game
description: You must have a good memory current events and history to win this Memory Game! This app demonstrates basic logic and state management using React.
modalDesc: Utilizing react, JavaScript, html5, css to randomize array of images in state to create a challenging memory exercise.

name: VacTrack
description: Do you know if you're up to date with your vaccinations? This is a MVP testing the concept of an adult vaccination tracker at your fingertips.
modalDesc: Technologies: React, mongodb, mongoose, heroku, html, css and basic JavaScript.  Role: Project Manager.  This project is currently being reconstructed.

name: Drink & Dine
description: This javascript app will transform random ingredients into amazing recipes for food and drinks. Minimalist, mobile-first design for easy grocery shopping.
modalDesc: Primarily managed project. Utilized JQuery, Ajax calls for drink API.

name: CPR Trivia Game
description: JavaScript game app designed as a fun pre-test for anyone considering taking an AHA or Red Cross CPR course. Additional, serious, questions would be used for health care practicioners.
modalDesc: Technologies: HTML5, JavaScript, css, bootstrap

name: Train Times
description: Using a Firebase backend, Train Times JavaScript app uses Moment.js to schedule and keep track of train arrival times.
modalDesc: Technologies: HTML5, JavaScript, css, bootstrap, moment, firebase

name: LIRI
description: Similar to Apple's 'SIRI', this CLI uses a Language Interpretation and Recognition Interface (LIRI) that will search 'Spotify', for songs, 'Bands in Town', for concerts and 'OMDB' for movies. See the README.md for detailed setup and use instructions.
modalDesc: Technologies: NodeJS, Express; Inquirer, moment, axios, node-spotify-api

name: Bamazon Book Search
description: This application used the MVC model to build a book search engine.
modalDesc: MVC Framework Technologies: MongDb, mongoose, expresss, bootstrap, html5, JavaScript, css, axios

name: Mango Store
description: This is an 'Amazon-esque' REST-API app using node express backend and ejs templating language, bcrypt hash encryption and token protected routes for shopping cart utilizing a Stripe test account.
modalDesc: MVC Framework Technologies: MongDb, mongoose, expresss, ejs, stripe, ES6 JS, css

name: Eat da Burger
description: Burger logger with MySQL, Node, Express, Handlebars and a homemade Object Relational Mapper (ORM) using the Model, View, Controller (MVC) design pattern.  MySQL/JawsDB backend is used to store data in this Heroku deployed app.
modalDesc: Technologies: mysql, sequelize, handlebars, express, JavaScript
